name: Invisiblehand
body:
Take those yucky, Xcode generated UIAutomation scripts and turn them into a
structured, readable test suite. Invisible Hand provides a loose framework to
abstract UIelements into 'screens' which can be exercised with assertions and
interactions. The result is more readable tests and faster creation of test
cases.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
